Title: The Most Disappointed Man
Writer: Dan Fogelman (created by), Kay Oyegun, Kay Oyegun (story editor), Jas Waters (staff writer)
Actors: Milo Ventimiglia, Mandy Moore, Sterling K. Brown, Chrissy Metz
Plot: Randall adjusts to the foster system; Kate and Toby take the next step in their relationship; Jack and Rebecca finalize Randall's adoption.
